name: Ducting and Streetlight Installation
template name: Ponsonby - ITP - Ducting and Streetlight Installation

name: Inspection / Test Method (Submission, Visual Inspection, Testing, Measurement, Review) - Document Review
Conformance Criteria - Control Checklist - Digging / Excavating (incl. marking out & potholing existing services).
• Ensure all necessary Permit to Works & Controlled Checklists are in place
Records - Permit attached or permit number noted
Detail - Ensure TMP is approved and check that the requirements are correctly interpreted and understood by the STMS
Inspection / Test Method (Submission, Visual Inspection, Testing, Measurement, Review) - Document Review
Conformance Criteria - TMP is approved by AT for the site and works are completed within the approved dates
Records - TMP on MyWorksites/ On Site
Detail - Ensure that Sub-Contract and Supplier Agreements are signed and that personnel have gone through the NWBI induction.
Inspection / Test Method (Submission, Visual Inspection, Testing, Measurement, Review) - Document Review
Conformance Criteria - Signed subcontract & Supplier agreements. Issued induction stickers and number
Records - Signed Agreements, Updated Induction Register
Detail - Ensure that Design is approved and Drawings are of the latest revision
Inspection / Test Method (Submission, Visual Inspection, Testing, Measurement, Review) - Document Review
Conformance Criteria - IFC label on drawings
Detail - Setout ducting alignment and Street light locations.
• Setout and mark all known services along the cable corridor.
Inspection / Test Method (Submission, Visual Inspection, Testing, Measurement, Review) - Survey
Records - Survey Records  Services Ducting Checksheet
6 - Locate existing services by hand digging/ hydrovac
Detail - Ensure all services conflicting with the line of trench has been exposed by hand digging
Inspection / Test Method (Submission, Visual Inspection, Testing, Measurement, Review) - Potholing
Conformance Criteria - All conflicts have been located
Records - Digging/Excavating Permit, Service Ducting Checksheet
Detail - Ensure bedding and cover material is as per vector specifications
Inspection / Test Method (Submission, Visual Inspection, Testing, Measurement, Review) - Document Review
Conformance Criteria - Crushing Resistance not less than 100kN. Maximum percentage of weight passing 0.075mm sieve shall not exceed 10%
Detail - Ensure duct pipes are as per drawings & spec.
Inspection / Test Method (Submission, Visual Inspection, Testing, Measurement, Review) - Ensure delivery docket matches materials
Conformance Criteria - Vector requirements as per ESE303, EDE3020, EDE3024
Records - Delivery Docket, Vector Specifications, Services Ducting Checksheet

Detail - Inspect trench profile to ensure vertical depth and trench widths as per vector specifications EDE 3024 and EC-21-ACIP4-304 (900mm min cover and 650mm min. trench width for two ducts and 350mm min. trench width for singular ducts)
Inspection / Test Method (Submission, Visual Inspection, Testing, Measurement, Review) - Visual Inspection
Conformance Criteria - Ensure trench profiles conform with corresponding vector specifications EDE 3024 and EC-21-ACIP4-304
Records -  Vector Specifications, Services Ducting Checksheet
Detail - Bedding depths for Ducting as per vector specifications EDE 3024 and EC-21-ACIP4-304.
Inspection / Test Method (Submission, Visual Inspection, Testing, Measurement, Review) - Visual inspection
Conformance Criteria - As per vector specifications EDE 3024 and EC-21-ACIP4-304
Records - Vector Specifications, Site Photos, Services Ducting Checksheet
Detail - Install Marker tape at 50% depth of  duct cover or as per utility owners specification.
Inspection / Test Method (Submission, Visual Inspection, Testing, Measurement, Review) - Visual inspection
Conformance Criteria - Vector specifications as per EDE3021
Records - Vector Specifications, Site Photos, Services Ducting Checksheet
11 - Backfill/ Compaction (also refer to specific utility owners requirements)
• GAP40, max. compaction layer 200 mm, as per TNZ B/2 Specification, CIV >=30
• Selected backfill, max. compaction layer 200mm, as per TNZ B/2 Specification, CIV >=20
Inspection / Test Method (Submission, Visual Inspection, Testing, Measurement, Review) - Lab/ testing
Records - Test Records/QA Sheets, Services Ducting Checksheet
Detail - Confirm column type, height and outreach arm correct for location as per AS/NZS 1158
Inspection / Test Method (Submission, Visual Inspection, Testing, Measurement, Review) - Document Review
Conformance Criteria - As per vector ATCoP Street Lighting
Detail - Luminaire types as detailed on drawings
Frequency - Prior to supplying to site
Inspection / Test Method (Submission, Visual Inspection, Testing, Measurement, Review) - Document review
Conformance Criteria - Refer to IFC Streetlight Drawings
Detail - Streetlighting to be position no more than 1m away from face of kerb to face of column
Inspection / Test Method (Submission, Visual Inspection, Testing, Measurement, Review) - Visual Inspection
Conformance Criteria - As per vector ATCoP Street Lighting
Detail - Foundation to be excavated as per manufacturer specification for ground planted columns
Inspection / Test Method (Submission, Visual Inspection, Testing, Measurement, Review) - Visual Inspection
Conformance Criteria - As per vector ATCoP Street Lighting
Detail - Backfilling with granular or concrete as per manufacturer specs
Inspection / Test Method (Submission, Visual Inspection, Testing, Measurement, Review) - Visual Inspection
Conformance Criteria - Refer to IFC Streetlight Drawings
Detail - Confirm column is bolted to base stub as per Manufacturer's Instructions
Inspection / Test Method (Submission, Visual Inspection, Testing, Measurement, Review) - Visual Inspection
Conformance Criteria - Refer to IFC Streetlight Drawings
Detail - Where needed, Ensure TUDs/pits and chambers are installed in the correct locations at asset owner's instruction to manufacturer and asset owner specifications
Inspection / Test Method (Submission, Visual Inspection, Testing, Measurement, Review) - Site Inspection/Design Review
Conformance Criteria - Sign off and approval by asset owner/MSQA

Detail - Ensure that certification, testing and commissioning undertaken according to Utility Service Provider's guidelines. After livening a test sheet recording the measured voltage at each light and each circuit current is required.
Inspection / Test Method (Submission, Visual Inspection, Testing, Measurement, Review) - Document Review
Conformance Criteria - Commisioning completed by vector authorities for Certificate of Compliance and Record of Inspection before operational sign off
Records - Test Certificates, COCs and ROIs
Detail - Equipment labels for Poles, Lighting Supply Boxes and internal equipment installed
Inspection / Test Method (Submission, Visual Inspection, Testing, Measurement, Review) - Visual Inspection
Conformance Criteria - All relevant labels placed
Detail - Cable installation records, Electrical test records, materials and equipment schedule, Survey As-Built
Frequency - At the completion of the Lot of work
Inspection / Test Method (Submission, Visual Inspection, Testing, Measurement, Review) - Drawings/Documents
